Description:
Solid 2 bedroom home on 1148m2
For more than meets the eye, this steel framed, brick veneer home has good sized rooms on a good sized block. Ideal investment property or easy care home with extension potential (STCA).
Featuring:
Slab floor heating plus Split system
Electric oven/lpg cook top
Built in robes
Fully enclosed back yard
Circular drive
Large single carport
Single lock up garage
Veranda to rear
Mount Beckworth views
To arrange inspection please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456908

Description:
4 Acres of Residential land in close proximity to town centre
An ideal tree change or hobby farm, this property has access from both Nicholson St and Cox's Lane and includes a horse shelter and dam. Increase your land size with the option to purchase the neighbouring land parcel of more than 2 acres. Enjoy undisturbed views of Mount Beckworth and countryside. Power, water & sewer available. Within 2 minutes of the historic town centre of Clunes with subdivision potential STCA

Description:
Beautifully presented home on 4 acres with fantastic views
This lovely home is situated in one of the best locations in town. A must to inspect for the serious buyer.
Features include:
* 3 Bedrooms plus study, en-suite & walk-in robe to master
* 2 Living areas
* Landscaped gardens
* All new fencing.
* Living room opens onto the under cover entertaining area complete with LED lighting over looking the valley and surrounding hills
* Plenty of car space in the double garage plus double carport
* Separate access to rear of property along with loading ramp for wood storage pads
* Open machinery shed with 25ft of undercover area and masses of storage in the 2x 40ft shipping containers. Perfect for any one in the large machinery business
All this and more …
Insights: 69 New North Court, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Union Arts Centre Circa 1865 Period style Residence & Commercial space with fully functioning Artists Studio/exhibition space
Rare opportunity to acquire an historical bank building with attached dwelling of seven substantial rooms and separate light filled studio/gallery space designed by renowned architect Daryl Jackson. Set in the heart of historic Clunes, this C19th street scape is home to 'Booktown' Festival bringing thousands of visitors to town. A fabulous home full of period features,14' ceilings, huge country kitchen with combustion stove, open fires and two bathrooms. Ideal home and business opportunity (B & B, gallery and/or restaurant).
Corner site of approximately 1031 sqm in two titles.
Insights: 22 Fraser Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Versatility on large block
Located only one block from the local Primary School, this home is ideal for family, investor or work from home. This good sized Miners Cottage has had renovations in previous years to provide a versatile use of space. Whether it be a formal dining room or a 3rd bedroom, 4th bedroom or home office with external access, configuration is your choice. Good sized kitchen and dining area includes lpg upright stove and combustion stove. Living area features sliding doors to separate dining or 3 bedroom. Wood heater and split system for cosy comfort. Outside there is plenty of room for the home gardener with single lock up garage & 2 x garden sheds, a variety of fruit trees and vegie patch for the those who like to grow their own . The rear of the property includes space set up for a pony with a shelter.
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Home On Acres With Massive Shed In Popular Clunes Estate
Privately located on an approx 3.2 acre corner block is this comfortable family home. Features include a renovated kitchen with meile dishwasher and good cupboard space, large lounge room with wood heater, split system and double doors that lead to an outside bbq area, there are 3 bedrooms all with BIR's . Outside there is a separate office/study, approx 3 kilowatt solar panel system, chook shed and dogs run, also 3 separate paddocks and heaps of space for the kids to play. The shedding is sensational with a smaller 12m x6m shed with double carport beside the house plus an even bigger 18m x 9m shed with high roof, dual access entry, 2x 15amp power points and fencing for privacy to accommodate multiple cars for parking. Just great for someone wanting space.
Insights: 40 Fairview Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Surprisingly Spacious on approx 3 acres
Located in a quiet court is this neat two bedroom home. Open plan in design, the lounge features a free standing wood heater, a split system and ceiling fans for added comfort. The main bedroom includes a generous walk-in robe, the second bedroom with a BIR. Previously set up for Greyhounds, includes a galloping run, kennels and a whelping shed. Plenty of space for self sufficiency or to run a few farm yard animals. Easy care garden consists of plenty of natives and shade trees. Also includes dbl carport, town water plus 3x water tanks. Only a couple of minutes drive to the centre of Clunes and less than 30 minutes to Ballarat and Maryborough makes this property an easy commute.
Insights: 15 Central Court, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
425 Acres of prime land with numerous options.
On offer is this rare opportunity to secure this large parcel of land of 425 acres located between Clunes and Creswick. Whether you are looking for land to crop, graze or potentially sub-divide (STCA), land will certainly be of interest. For further information please call today.
- 425 Acres
- Fully Fenced with 9 separate paddocks
- Shearing shed
- Sheep and cattle yards
- Solar Power Bore
- Reticulated water system to troughs throughout the property
- 30,000 litre water tank
- 3 x road frontages
- Approx. 60-70% arable land
- 3 x dams
- 2 x seasonal creeks

Description:
TWO GREAT HOMES ON A VERY GENEROUS BLOCK
Positioned above the Historic township of Clunes this prestigious home has views over the meandering Creswick Creek, the Town Centre and surrounds. The principal residence comprises 4 Bedrooms and three distinct living areas, a study, a large separate laundry and DLUG.
The Master Bedroom has a WIR and a full modern ensuite whilst the remaining 3 spacious bedrooms all have BIR.
The three separate living areas include a modern recently renovated kitchen/living with stylish raked ceilings throughout. The kitchen has high quality commercial appliances and leads to another large entertaining area which could easily become a cinema room. The third living area is ideal for the kids Rumpus room and is currently set up as a Games room.
A cosy temperature is controlled by a large wood fire box, complimented by two strategically placed R/C air conditioners.
A quality 2-bedroom Bond Home has its own separate outdoor entertaining and garden. It also has the distinct advantage of having a Disability access at the rear of the building.
Outdoors the grandeur continues with the Upper and Lower decks catering for any mood and gathering. The large deck area comprises a substantial undercover entertaining space with the lower deck catering for a more intimate group.
There are four separate titled blocks of land for your development in the future (STCA).
The property has Shedding galore with a 10 by 8 metre shed the piece de resistance. The Ultimate Man's shed.
An elevated vege patch and over 50,000 litres of tank water are added features. All services including town water are available to the site.
The established native style gardens are designed to be low maintenance and reflect the four seasons on offer in Clunes
The property is under 1/2 hour to Ballarat and just 20 minutes to the Western Freeway.
Creswick is 10 minutes away and you can anywhere in Melbourne in under two hours.
What and there's more..................!
Tony Mullins : 0422 630 516
Insights: 3 Coundon Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
'Crabapple Cottage'
This lovely 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom cottage has character and charm in abundance. French doors from the living room open onto a cosy north facing nook, perfect for reading a good book or simply enjoy the sunny aspect this lovely space creates. Follow the Tuscan stone garden paths as they wind their way through the beautifully maintained garden. The timber decked outdoor entertaining area is a bonus in the warmer months, a wood fired area for cooler days of the year. New shedding & quality renovation in 2nd bathroom. Optional furniture package for B&B investors.
Located within walking distance to all that historic Clunes has to offer. main street and only a short walk to Clunes Health Service and Train Station.
For further information please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908

A Hidden Treasure in Historic Clunes

Description:
Location, Location!
Ideal weekender, investor or first home owner right in the heart of town.
This conveniently located 2 bedroom home is only 60 metres from the front gate to historic Fraser St. Easy access to cafes, specialty shops and general shopping needs. Old Bluestone gutters feature along the front of the property and onto the main street. With loads of potential, this property also includes established shade trees and shrubs in a low maintenance setting.
Features:
2 Bedrooms
Electric cooking & hws
LPG gas heating
Carpet to living & bedrooms with timber floor boards ideal for polishing
Garden shed
Off street parking
For Inspection by appointment only please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301

Description:
3.46 acres of Peace and Quiet
At the end of a quiet court, just a few minutes from the centre of town, is this ideal building block (STCA). A patch of paradise for the ponies and owners alike. Boundaries on 2 sides of Gum trees with rear of block including some mature Gums and a variety of Australian natives. Also includes a shipping container with timber flooring and kitchen cupboards. A small animal shelter protects from the elements. Power, water & telephone all available.
Insights: 21 Central Court, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
A versatile property on approx. 3.5 acres
If you are looking for a home to meet the needs of extended family or potential for rental income then this could be the one for you.
Lightly treed & set well back on the block for privacy, the north facing main one bedroom dbl brick home features a slow combustion wood stove, split system & spa bath, fully furnished with quality appliances .
An extra 6x6m self-contained grannie flat adds versatility and also comes fully furnished sleeping 6. A large undercover outdoor entertaining area connects the two.
Good supply of shedding includes 7.4x5.8 powered garage with concrete floor & wood heater, also a lined and insulated office/studio with small sink & own hws with wall heater & air conditioner, a hay shed and c/van port.
Well set up for the ponies with stable, tack room & round yard. A fox proof chook yard tops it off. Divided into 3 paddocks with lovely country views.
Only a few minutes drive to the centre of town.
For all this and more, inspection recommended.
For more information please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908
Insights: 76 Fairview Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2020 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Clunes Country Delight - On Approx 10 Acres
* Just on the fringe of the Clunes Township – on the Ballarat side.
* Approximately 10 acres of grazing with shelter belts and shade.
* Trees also provide privacy and serenity. Excellent dam for stock.
* A stylish and solid Ranch style,Western Red Cedar home will delight
* All three bedrooms have BIR’s and ceiling fans
* Lovely lounge with cathedral ceiling.Ample kitchen- meals area is ideal
* Double garage. Machinery shed. Carport. Stable. Wood shed
* Good type outdoor room has light, power, aircon & BIR. Many uses.
* Stock proof fencing. Older tennis court. The dam is a beauty.

Description:
Ella's Cottage - The perfect Country Getaway
Situated in the picturesque township of Clunes (only 90 minutes from Melbourne and an easy drive to Daylesford, Ballarat and Castlemaine), this utterly charming double-fronted Victorian cottage invites you to take time out to relax, unwind and enjoy all the delights this historic goldfields region has to offer.
This gem of a property has been completely renovated and offers 2 double bedrooms, a cosy living room with gas fire, split cycle heating and cooling, a modern kitchen and sparkling bathroom.
Currently operating as popular self-contained accommodation, Ella's Cottage enjoys peace and privacy, nestled in pretty gardens complete with old walnut tree and surrounded by lovely mature hedges. Situated on quarter of an acre, but only a two minute stroll to shops and cafes, the property also provides plenty of room to extend or even subdivide (stca).
Glenda Rozen
Insights: 1 Cameron Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.
